data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Tambacounda, Senegal.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tambacounda, Senegal
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Tambacounda, Senegal.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 618,863 lost people in  Tambacounda, Senegal have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Tambacounda.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Soninke people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Soninke people.
Father, encourage your church in Tambacounda that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tambacounda, Senegal.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Tambacounda, Senegal has a population of 649,900.

We estimate Tambacounda has 1,259 people who might know Jesus, 29,777 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 618,863 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 516 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tambacounda.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.
